Ok, if any of you out there are using vista, you need to do this one extra step. After you extract the file with winrar, drag the extracted file to C:\Program Files\Microsoft Games. This should fix some problems you might have when you start the game up. Im using vista ultimate X86 Build 6000 on a 32 Bit processor. This game is pretty good, especially with the firepower add-on. Enjoy.

hey dopeman, thanks for the file. I actually went into best buy and bought the game and remembered i used this site :) I see everyone having trouble starting this file as I was until I figured out what to do. This should solve all the starting issues. After downloading AND SEEDING.  Here is a Tip. USING WINDOWS XP  i rar'd the file using winRAR, then took the extracted folder called "combat flight" i moved the folder and all of its contents to my C drive and program files folder.  HERE ARE THE STEPS, EXTRACT THE FILE CALLED COMBAT FLIGHT 7 ZIP, THEN A FOLDER CALLED COMBAT FLIGHT APPEARS. MOVE THE FOLDER TO YOUR PROGRAM FILES FOLDER, THIS IS FOUND IN C DRIVE THEN IN PROGRAM FILES. ONCE THE FOLDER IS IN THE PROGRAM FILES FOLDER LOOK FOR THE THE ICON THAT IS CFS3CONFIG AND RUN IT. ONCE FINISHED RUN THE FILE THAT IS CFS3 LOGO USUALLY A START LOGO. RIGHT CLICK THE LOGO AND SEND IT TO THE DESK TOP USING A SHORT CUT.  ONCE THIS SHORTCUT IS THERE YOU CAN START THE GAME EASILY AND EFFORTLESSLY!  THANKS DOPEMAN YOUR THE BEST!!!

Been putting out the word about Just Planes Air Greenland.  Forgive me if you have run into this request a few times - just spreading out the alert.  30 folks are stuck at 28.4%.  It's been about 5 weeks, maybe more and patiently we are all hoping for a hero to jump in and save the day.  Anyone and Everyone that hears and helps - Thanks 10,000 times.  PB Seeders are AWEsome.  BEV was requested and less than 1 Day (!) later PB came forward and seeded.  Thnx!

if u have never played CFS3  dont let the out of the box game disappoint you.This is one of the best combat flight games out there.Once u have this game dowloaded and installed my advice is to get the many many addons that are available.
The MAW addon is simply awesome.If u dont get some of the addons u are missing so much that this game has to offer  here is a link to a site that will get u started and also if u have problems this is the place to get answers
